CodeBlockMethod.Name: ShowDiaryGo
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.Show == false then if self.DiaryGo.Enable == false and self.DiaryFindRule.Enable == false then self.DiaryGo.Enable = true self.DiaryFindRule.Enable = true wait(5) self.DiaryGo.Enable = false end self.Show = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if TriggerBodyEntity.Id == _UserService.LocalPlayer.Id then self:ShowDiaryGo() end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if self.DiaryFindRule.Enable == true then self.DiaryFindRule.Enable = false self.DiaryGo.Enable = false end
